==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ふ|じゅつ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|sort=ふじゅつ|ltc|巫術|tr=mju zywit}}. Formerly read with the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] as ''bujutsu''.<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''bû su̍t''.

===Pronunciation===

===Noun===
